mdx.body:
# Micser

Micser is a free and open source .NET audio routing framework.

I'm currently refactoring big parts of it to make it actually work, releases will be coming soon (TM).

The source code is available at: [https://github.com/loreggia/micser](https://github.com/loreggia/micser)

Build Status: ![Build Status](https://dev.azure.com/loreggia/micser/_apis/build/status/micser%20CI?branchName=master)
